data.title: January weather
data.meta_description: January weather for Zagreb, Croatia: The month with the most snowfall days in Zagreb is January, when snow falls for 10.3 days. In Zagreb, Croatia, during January, snow falls for 10.3 days.
data.text:
Average temperature in January

Zagreb, Croatia

Average high temperature in January: 3.7°C

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (26.7°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (3.7°C).

Average low temperature in January: -3°C

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (14.7°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (-3°C).

Average snowfall days in January

Zagreb, Croatia

Average snowfall days in January: 10.3 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (10.3 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are May, June, July, August, September and October (0 days).

Average daylight in January /

Average sunshine in January

Zagreb, Croatia

Average daylight in January: 9h and 1min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 15h and 42min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 8h and 42min).

Average sunshine in January: 1h and 5min

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 8h and 54min).

The month with the least sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 1h and 36min).

Average UV index in January

Zagreb, Croatia

Average UV index in January: 1

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 8).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, November and December (UV index 1).
